channel.title: Crash: bm_c1a2a
channel.description: Hi all, I would just like to report a game crash I am experiencing on 'bm_c1a2a'. Just after exiting the elevator you have the electricity killing the head crabs on the left and the two scientists on the right behind a red door. After proceeding out of the lift you wait for the electricity to blow out the duct vent. Upon entering the duct as soon as I move either down or up the duct game crashes without warning. I have tried to replace the files for Black Mesa as well as download a entire new copy with no success. Attached is the mini dump file. Appreciate any input. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T4_0_16C0.mdmp (92.4 KB)

item.title: Crash: bm_c1a2a
item.dc:creator: risbo
item.description:
sersoft:

Put shadows on medium to use the old flashlight.

Thanks, This has worked so far without an issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash: bm_c1a2a
item.dc:creator: risbo
item.description:
Tried re-downloading AGAIN for the 5th time. Still to no success.

EDIT: I’ve tried to ‘Changelevel’ skip this section, however I get missing doors, people, machines, basically its random every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash: bm_c1a2a
item.dc:creator: Shadis
item.description:
Just as a heads up on this, and it might not be related. But every time I turn on my flash light in that same place the game crashes. It kept crashing on the elevator right down while I had the flash light already on. I only was able to get into the level with the flash light off, and so far I’ve had to keep it off or the game crashes on me.

risbo:

I just got a little further past, Able to isolate the electricity and it crashed once again.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash: bm_c1a2a
item.dc:creator: risbo
item.description:
Hi all,

I would just like to report a game crash I am experiencing on ‘bm_c1a2a’.

Just after exiting the elevator you have the electricity killing the head crabs on the left and the two scientists on the right behind a red door.

After proceeding out of the lift you wait for the electricity to blow out the duct vent. Upon entering the duct as soon as I move either down or up the duct game crashes without warning.

I have tried to replace the files for Black Mesa as well as download a entire new copy with no success.

Attached is the mini dump file.

Appreciate any input.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T4_0_16C0.mdmp (92.4 KB)

Read full topic
